name: Untitled Tactics Game
description:
Unfinished tactics game for LOWREZJAM 2021 due to running out of time and bad code.
May take a few seconds to load.

Notes
- Attack damage is based on health, so chipping down enemy units with high HP is important.
    - Attack is equal to 40% of health.
- Enemy movement might be a little broken.
- Click on an empty tile to pass your turn.
- No real "win" state -- just beat every enemy unit.

Controls
Arrow Keys - Move cursor
Z - Select
X - Back
R - Reset Game

Palette - PICO-8 with transparency
